title: Change name of SOLR749Test
description:
The test class named SOLR749Test is inconsistent with all of the rest of the unit tests, which aren't tied to their JIRA issue names. Some examples of best practices:

http://googletesting.blogspot.com/2007/02/tott-naming-unit-tests-responsibly.html
http://blog.taragana.com/index.php/archive/java-unit-testing-best-practices/
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#best

comments.author: Chris A. Mattmann
comments.content:
